title: Short: Vandana Shiva
subtitle: Short: Vandana Shiva
summary:
Vandana Shiva is an is an Indian scholar, environmental activist and food sovereignty advocate. She’s spent much of her life in the defence and celebration of biodiversity and indigenous knowledge. 

This is a recording of a talk at the Farming the Future event, organised by the Roddick and A Team Foundations. 

A shorter version of this episode is featured in Episode 46 of Farmerama. 

Edited by Suzie McCarthy
